Window_Size Property

CDXML Name:WindowSize
CDX Constant Name:kCDXProp_Window_Size
CDX Constant Value:0x0902
Data Size:CDXPoint2D
Property of objects:kCDXObj_Document
First written/read in:ChemDraw 4.0
Required?No

Description:

Height and width of the document window.

Until ChemDraw 7.0, if this property is present, if this property is present, the kCDXProp_Window_Position property must also be present

If this property is absent:

The window is sized appropriately for the screen.
